<div class=WordSection1>

<p><span style='font-family:"Georgia","serif";mso-no-proof:yes'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype
 id="_x0000_t75" coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t"
 path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe" filled="f" stroked="f">
 <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
 <v:formulas>
  <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
 </v:formulas>
 <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
 <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
</v:shapetype><v:shape id="Picture_x0020_1" o:spid="_x0000_i1026" type="#_x0000_t75"
 alt="Description: Description: self" style='width:77.4pt;height:110.4pt;
 visibility:visible;mso-wrap-style:square'>
 <v:imagedata src="index_files/image002.jpg" o:title=" self"/>
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=129 height=184
src="index_files/image005.jpg" alt="Description: Description: self" v:shapes="Picture_x0020_1"><![endif]></span><span
style='font-family:"Georgia","serif"'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Monotype Corsiva";mso-fareast-font-family:
SimSun'>BIJIT HORE <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='mso-fareast-font-family:SimSun'>(Research
Staff)<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p><span style='font-family:"Georgia","serif"'>I am a member of the <a
href="http://isg.ics.uci.edu/">Information Systems Group (ISG)</a> in the <a
href="http://www.ics.uci.edu/">Donald Bren School of Information and Computer
Science</a> at <a href="http://www.uci.edu">University of California, Irvine</a>.
I primarily collaborate with Prof. <a href="http://www.ics.uci.edu/~sharad"><span
class=SpellE>Sharad</span> <span class=SpellE>Mehrotra</span></a> and Prof. <a
href="http://www.ics.uci.edu/~nalini"><span class=SpellE>Nalini</span> <span
class=SpellE>Venkatasubramanian</span></a>.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><u><span style='font-family:"Georgia","serif"'>Research
Interests</span></u></b><span style='font-family:"Georgia","serif"'>: <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p><span style='font-family:"Georgia","serif"'>My research focuses on
privacy-preservation and disclosure-control in data outsourcing, data mining
and pervasive-space applications. My broader research interest spans relational
& geo-spatial data management, data mining, distributed systems, graph
theory and combinatorial optimization.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><u><span
style='font-family:"Georgia","serif"'>Recent Publications</span></u></b><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:"Georgia","serif"'>:<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Georgia","serif"'><o:p> </o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='font-family:"Georgia","serif";color:red'>New! </span></b><span
class=SpellE><span style='font-family:"Georgia","serif"'>Indexing</span></span><span
style='font-family:"Georgia","serif"'>Encrypted Documents for Supporting Efficient Keyword Search
(Secure Data Management Workshop, VLDB 2012)<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span class=SpellE><span style='font-family:"Georgia","serif"'>Bijit</span> <span class=SpellE>Hore</span>,
<span class=SpellE>Mamadou</span></span><span style='font-family:"Georgia","serif"'> H. <span class=SpellE>Diallo</span>,
<span class=SpellE>Ee-Chien</span> Chang, <span class=SpellE>Sharad</span> <span class=SpellE>Mehrotra</span>.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Georgia","serif"'><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='font-family:"Georgia","serif";color:red'>New! </span></b><span
class=SpellE><span style='font-family:"Georgia","serif"'>CloudProtect</span></span><span
style='font-family:"Georgia","serif"'>: Managing Data Privacy in Cloud
Applications (accepted for publication in IEEE CLOUD, 2012)<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span class=SpellE><span style='font-family:"Georgia","serif"'>Mamadou</span></span><span
style='font-family:"Georgia","serif"'> H. <span class=SpellE>Diallo</span>, <span
class=SpellE>Bijit</span> <span class=SpellE>Hore</span>, <span class=SpellE>Ee-Chien</span>
Chang, <span class=SpellE>Sharad</span> <span class=SpellE>Mehrotra</span>, <span
class=SpellE>Nalini</span> <span class=SpellE>Venkatasubramanian</span>.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Georgia","serif"'><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='font-family:"Georgia","serif";color:red'>New! </span></b><span
style='font-family:"Georgia","serif"'>Risk-Aware Workload Distribution in
Hybrid Clouds (accepted for publication in IEEE CLOUD, 2012)<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span class=SpellE><span style='font-family:"Georgia","serif"'>Kerim</span></span><span
style='font-family:"Georgia","serif"'> <span class=SpellE>Yasin</span> <span
class=SpellE>Oktay</span>, <span class=SpellE>Vaibhav</span> <span
class=SpellE>Khadilkar</span>, <span class=SpellE>Bijit</span> <span
class=SpellE>Hore</span>, Murat <span class=SpellE>Kantarcioglu</span>, <span
class=SpellE>Sharad</span> <span class=SpellE>Mehrotra</span>, <span
class=SpellE>Bhavani</span> <span class=SpellE>Thurasingham</span>.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='font-family:"Georgia","serif";color:red'><o:p> </o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='font-family:"Georgia","serif";color:red'>New! </span></b><span
class=SpellE><span style='font-family:"Georgia","serif"'>ReCrew</span></span><span
style='font-family:"Georgia","serif"'>: A Reliable Flash-Dissemination System
(Accepted for publication in IEEE Transactions on Computers, 2012)<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span class=SpellE><span style='font-family:"Georgia","serif"'>Kyungbaek</span></span><span
style='font-family:"Georgia","serif"'> Kim, <span class=SpellE>Mayur</span> <span
class=SpellE>Deshpande</span>, <span class=SpellE>Bijit</span> <span
class=SpellE>Hore</span>, <span class=SpellE>Sharad</span> <span class=SpellE>Mehrotra</span>,
<span class=SpellE>Nalini</span> <span class=SpellE>Venkatasubramanian</span>.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p><span style='font-family:"Georgia","serif"'>CV (Made available upon request)<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p><span style='font-family:"Georgia","serif"'><a href="research.html">Research</a><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p><span style='font-family:"Georgia","serif"'>----------------------------------
<br>
Contact information: <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p><span style='font-family:"Georgia","serif"'>Phone: (949) 824 -3011<o:p></o:p></span></p>
